body: This spell functions like magic circle against evil, except that it is similar to protection from chaos instead of protection from evil, and it can imprison a nonlawful called creature.
description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.
level_text: Cleric: 3; Inquisitor: 3; Oracle: 3; Paladin: 3; Sorcerer: 3; Summoner: 3; Wizard: 3
name: Magic Circle Against Chaos
